live_updates: Hydro continues to work to restore power. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41999.summary: Customers in  Whistler are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41999.title: Sept 20 – Whistler | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

42018.title: Sept 20 – Terrace Bay | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42019.summary: Some customers in the Northwood area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to their Internet services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42019.title: Sept 20 – Thunder Bay (Northwood) | Internet Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
